Subject: New NHK Taiga Drama - Tokio and Saitou will make an appearance.

Hello hello,=A0

I thought I would share the news, although some of you may=
 already know.=A0

NHK's 2013 taiga (historical) drama, 'Yae no Sakura' wil=
l be about the inimitable Yamamoto Yae, one of the most famous women of Aiz=
u. And as we know, a big part of her story is the War of Aizu, when Takagi =
Tokio cut her hair for her before the battle. It seems that Tokio will be f=
eatured in the series as Yae's good friend, and she will be played by Kanji=
ya Shihori (I think she's a good pick for the role, in my humble opinion). =
Saitou Hajime will also make an appearance, and he will be played by Furuya=
 Kenji who is a member of the band Dragon Ash (not quite sure of that pick,=
 I prefer Eguchi Yosuke who will play Saitou in the live action RK movie). =
There's quite a bit of buzz among the Japanese SaitouxTokio fans out there.=
=A0

I've been waiting for the longest time for any kind of medium that wou=
ld feature my favorite couple, so I'm absolutely psyched. In the meantime, =
I'm finally getting around to finishing my own fanfic of the pair, and in t=
he process of writing up Chapter 30, The Battle of Aizu.

NHK originally pl=
anned to air a different historical drama but after the earthquake, tsunami=
 and nuclear disaster of 2011, they decided that they should focus on the h=
istory of the Fukushima (formerly Aizu) region.=A0

[Non-text portions of t=
his message have been removed]
